comments: This contract was competitively sourced.Canada Gazette, as a priority service of PWGSC, is undergoing a modernization exercise of its website. To assist us in this modernization, a Project Manager (PM) and publication specialist was hired to develop a project plan for integrating two new modules in the Gazette InDesign production tool.The PM will prepare layout materiel using an InDesign template, and manage the transition from the current production tool to the new tool (Adobe InDesign)
